DataElement.preferredName: CRQ-SAS 18 Last 2 Weeks Happy Satisfied or Pleased with Personal Life Score 7 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation in the last 2 weeks of how happy, satisfied, or pleased have they been with their personal life, using an 7 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format Past 2 Weeks Happy, Satisfied, or Pleased with Personal Life Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale developed by Schunemann et al in 2003, which is a self-administered instrument used to measure the health-related quality of life (HRQL) in patients with chronic airflow limitation._A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present._A question about an individual feeling  happy, satisfied, or pleased with their personal life._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale developed by Schunemann et al in 2003, which is a self-administered instrument used to measure the health-related quality of life (HRQL) in patients with chronic airflow limitation.

Concepts.longName: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format
Concepts.definition: A standardized rating scale developed by Schunemann et al in 2003, which is a self-administered instrument used to measure the health-related quality of life (HRQL) in patients with chronic airflow limitation.

Property.preferredName: Past 2 Weeks Happy, Satisfied, or Pleased with Personal Life Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present.:A question about an individual feeling  happy, satisfied, or pleased with their personal life.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present.

Concepts.longName: Happy, Satisfied, or Pleased with Personal Life
Concepts.definition: A question about an individual feeling happy, satisfied, or pleased with their personal life.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been extremely happy and could not have been more satisfied or pleased.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been extremely happy and could not have been more satisfied or pleased.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Most of the Time Very Happy

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Most of the Time Very Happy
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened most of the time.: A response indicating that an individual is or has been very happy most of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened most of the time.
A response indicating that an individual is or has been very happy most of the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been happy most of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been happy most of the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been generally satisfied or pleased.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been generally satisfied or pleased.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been somewhat dissatisfied or unhappy.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been somewhat dissatisfied or unhappy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been generally dissatisfied or unhappy.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been generally dissatisfied or unhappy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been very dissatisfied and unhappy most of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been very dissatisfied and unhappy most of the time.

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
